parcelhub.utilities

Class ParcelXMLFileWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • parcelhub.utilities.ParcelXMLFileWriter

  • public class ParcelXMLFileWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    ParcelCSVFileWriter.java This class provides an abstraction to write our database. Using XML! For extra credit. 
        Project: Parcel Hub Database
    Platform: jdk 1.8.0_14; NetBeans IDE 8.1; Windows 10
    Course: CS 143
    Created on May 10, 2016, 2:09:33 PM
    Revised on May 10, 2016, PM

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String fileName
      The file name of our database
      private java.util.ArrayList<Parcel> parcels
      ArrayList of Parcel Objects which we are writing to our database.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ParcelXMLFileWriter(java.util.ArrayList<Parcel> parcelList, java.lang.String filePath)
      Sets the list of Parcels we wish to save and the location at which we will save our database.
      ParcelXMLFileWriter(java.lang.String filePath)
      Creates an empty XML file at the location of our choice.

    • Method Summary
